name: Swell
description: This is an example that shows how to use the fx_adsr_envelope effect to create a swell-like effects.  The ADSR envelope standads for attack-decay- sustain-release and controls how quickly a note fades and out.  The sketch also demonstrates how to route the new note pedal event to the ADSR envelope so each time  you play a new note, the ADSR envelope is applied.
creator: DreamMaker
